DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect body weight combination fenofibrate metformin top moderate balance calorie-deficit diet .
DOC.brief_title: A Controlled-Study Effect Combination Fenofibrate Metformin Weight Loss Weight Loss-Maintenance , Obese Patients .
DOC.criteria: Both gender , BMI ≥ 30 kg/m² < 40 kg/m² . Known abnormal thyroid hormone level , high thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) level .
